package.name: GroundWorkInsertUpdate
package.description: Web service supporting insertion or updating of incidents with data from GroundWork Monitor

wscomponent.description: Web service supporting insertion or updating of incidents with data from GroundWork Monitor

Parameter.Name: MonitorStatus
Parameter.Description: Status text describing the status for the event

Parameter.Name: MsgCount
Parameter.Description: Number of consolidated events for the event

Parameter.Name: HostGroups
Parameter.Description: List of location Host Groups which the Host belongs to

Parameter.Name: Operator
Parameter.Description: Log in name of the GroundWork Monitor Portal user wo is requesting a ticket to be created

properties.WebMethodDescription: Web service supporting insertion or updating of incidents with data from GroundWork Monitor

sdecomponent.description: Web Services Service Desk Express Adapter
